      • isValid

        public ConfigurationPropagator.IsValidMethod isValid()
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationPropagator
        Checks that all manual and automatic selections are valid.
        Abstract features will not be ignored.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface IConfigurationPropagator
        Returns:
        true if the current selection is a valid configuration

        public ConfigurationPropagator.CountSolutionsMethod number(long timeout,
                                                           boolean includeHiddenFeatures)
        Counts the number of possible solutions.
        Specified by:
        number in interface IConfigurationPropagator
        Returns:
        a positive value equal to the number of solutions (if the method terminated in time)
        or a negative value (if a timeout occurred) that indicates that there are more solutions than the absolute value
